title: What is the benefit of joining Zifo technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: I got placed to ZIFO RnD Solution ( The new brand name of Zifo Technologies Pvt Ltd) right after college. I was lucky enough to be one among the two who got selected out of 100, approximately, who attended the placement. I worked at Zifo for over two years. As far as stayed in Zifo, I thought I was receiving an average learning, average salary, average opportunity to use my creativity, and all the other average of the expectations I had about work life. Well, I no longer work there now. But only now I realise how much I regret moving out. Fact : Zifo is an heaven for freshers who regret not leaning anything at college, but wants to learn , use their creativity and prove themselves with struggle of life. You would not want to have a work life balance at the initial stages of your work life. Trust me you should not. You would loose many things in later part of life. The amount of domain knowledge you gain at Zifo is extremely rare to receive at any other company. There is no friendlier work place and colleagues you can receive. The top level officials here are an awesome friends gang who is playing the game of business. You would given wonderful opportunity and motivation if you can you prove them you have it. Summary : Go for it and earn an awesome memorable mark in early work life.

I currently work here. And I can say with full confidence it is one of the best companies out there in life sciences space. Domain knowledgeJob security(yup writing amid this Covid situation)Corporate culture only when required otherwise like friendsOpen minded for all ideasNo discrimination based on the years of experience or such thingsAwesome exposure to different cultures through workDifferent perspectivesGames for refreshmentResting space where one can read or take power napsFlexible work hours( but depends on your team though)
